= Third-party

PurgeCSS:: {empty}

== Visual Studio Code Extensions

https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=KalimahApps.tailwindcss-kit[TailwindCSS Kit]::
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bradlc.vscode-tailwindcss[Tailwind CSS IntelliSense]::: autocomplete, syntax highlighting, and linting.
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=stivo.tailwind-fold[Tailwind Fold]::: Folds long class attributes.
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=alfredbirk.tailwind-documentation[Tailwind Documentation]::: Search in Tailwind docs.
https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=KalimahApps.tailwind-config-viewer[Tailwind Config Viewer]::: View the config of your Tailwind CSS project in a sidebar.
